item.title: Zenzile add a quote by J. Krishanmurti
item.description: "The fact is that truth is life and life has no permanency. Life has to be discovered from moment to moment, from day to day. It has to be discovered. It cannot be taken for granted. If you take it for granted that you know life, than you are not living. Three meals a day, clothing, shelter, sex, your job, your amusement, and your thinking process--that dull, repetitive process is not life." -- J. Krishanmurti

item.title: Zenzile add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "To know one’s own state is not a simple matter. One cannot look directly at one’s own face with one’s own eyes, for example. One has no choice but to look at one’s reflection in the mirror. Through experience, we come to believe that the image is correct, but that is all." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Zenzile add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "In a place far away from anyone or anywhere, I drifted off for a moment." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Zenzile add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "What we seek is some kind of compensation for what we put up with." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Zenzile add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Whiskey, like a beautiful woman, demands appreciation. You gaze first, then it's time to drink." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Zenzile add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "On any given day, something claims our attention. Anything at all, inconsequential things. A rosebud, a misplaced hat, that sweater we liked as a child, an old Gene Pitney record. A parade of trivia with no place to go. Things that bump around in our consciousness for two or three days then go back to wherever they came from... to darkness. We've got all these wells dug in our hearts. While above the wells, birds flit back and forth." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Zenzile add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description:
"But didn't you say you were satisfied with your life?"
"Word games," I dismissed. "Every army needs a flag." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Zenzile add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Taking crazy things seriously is a serious waste of time." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Zenzile add a quote by Zora Neale Hurston
item.description: "If you are silent about your pain, they’ll kill you and say you enjoyed it." -- Zora Neale Hurston

item.title: Zenzile add a quote by Zora Neale Hurston
item.description: "Those that don't got it, can't show it. Those that got it, can't hide it." -- Zora Neale Hurston
